Bone Devil.name: Ossification
Bone Devil.text: The sting of the Devil turns your bones to cork

Clay Golem.name: Reflect
Clay Golem.text: You strike the Clay Golem and are swiftly knocked back by your own strike deflecting off of the creature.

Cloud Giant.name: Crushing Spells
Cloud Giant.text: You fend off spell after spell until the meteor comes. You didn't fend that one off.

Fire Giant.name: Volcanic Assault
Fire Giant.text: With every strike, a fountain of lava engulfs you.

Glabrezu.name: Beat Down
Glabrezu.text: You let the Glabrezu snatch you, this won't end well.

Treant.name: Wretched Vines
Treant.text: A vine slips by you and wraps around your neck as the ground slowly drifts farther away.

Aboleth.name: Psychic Dredge
Aboleth.text: You feel your mind slip out of this plane of existence. The ethereal pain comes next.

Deva.name: Holy Mace
Deva.text: The celestial mace meets your celestial face.

Stone Golem.name: Slam
Stone Golem.text: The Stone Golem need not do more than merely fall upon you.

Behir.name: Plasmitic Corrosion
Behir.text: The serpent lays teeth in your flesh, oozing a corrosive plasma that devours your physical being.

Djinni.name: Whirling Dervish
Djinni.text: The mystical Djinni somehow appears behind you before assaulting you in a thousand slashes.

Efreeti.name: Demonic Crush
Efreeti.text: The Efreeti telekinetically pulls you into its blade, very, very, slowly.

Horned Devil.name: Demon Commander
Horned Devil.text: The Horned Devil calls down a horde of imps to rend you asunder.

Remorhaz.name: Consume
Remorhaz.text: Into the belly of the beast.

Roc.name: Sky Bash
Roc.text: A bird of unimaginable size grabs you and takes flight. The Roc releases you at an untennable height.
